review: It doesn't work. I've tried wireless and Ethernet and it won't load movies, either from Amazon's own content or Netflix. Also, no audio. Good idea, lousy follow through.

review: This is the biggest waste of money ever.  The product has a very limited selection of mostly old movies for free.  I have been unable to watch any PBS or History channel shows from those apps.  The buttons for these options just don't seem to work at all.  So much for easy access to free TV shows.  It is hard to find the netflix movies, since there is no search available.  This is just a gimic to encourage you to give Amazon more money.  The search works wonderfully for Amazon content, and that's it.  I can buy a Blue Ray Player for the same money and get access to Netflix and Hulu and also have a blue ray player!  This has to go.
author: Barbara Baughman
